item.title: About Me
item.description:
Who am I?

My name is Samir Masih. I’m a 22 year old software developer looking for full-time opportunities. I am a Clemson University Computer Science Graduate (B.S.), passionate about every level of programming out there. Whether it’s high-level application and web development or low-level assembly work, I’m always looking to make new things and learn everything I can to make software for people that need it.

The fields that I’m currently interested in/working in:
